//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   sampler2D AttenTex;
//   sampler2D DepthSpecBuffer;
//   float2 InvTexSizeMask;
//   float4 LightAngle;
//   float4 LightColor;
//   float3 LightDir;
//   float3 LightPos;
//   float4 LightRadius;
//   sampler2D NormalBuffer;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name            Reg   Size
//   --------------- ----- ----
//   LightPos        c32      1
//   LightColor      c33      1
//   LightRadius     c34      1
//   LightDir        c35      1
//   LightAngle      c36      1
//   InvTexSizeMask  c53      1
//   NormalBuffer    s1       1
//   DepthSpecBuffer s2       1
//   AttenTex        s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, 2, -1, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xyw
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.xyz
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    rcp r0.x, v1.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, v1
    mad r0.xy, r0, c0.x, c0.x
    mov r1.x, c0.x
    mad r0.xy, c53, r1.x, r0
    texld r1, r0, s2
    texld r0, r0, s1
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c0.y, c0.z
    rcp r0.w, v0.w
    mul r1.yzw, r0.w, v0.xxyz
    mad r1.xyz, r1.x, r1.yzww, v2
    add r1.xyz, -r1, c32
    dp3 r0.w, r1, r1
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    rcp r1.w, r0.w
    mul r1.xyz, r0.w, r1
    mul_pp r2.x, r1.w, c34.y
    mov r2.y, c0.w
    texld_pp r2, r2, s3
    dp3 r0.w, c35, -r1
    dp3_sat r0.x, r1, r0
    add r0.y, r0.w, -c36.x
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c36.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r2.x
    mul r0.yzw, r0.y, c33.xxyz
    mul oC0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww
    mov oC0.w, c0.w

// approximately 27 instruction slots used (3 texture, 24 arithmetic)
